Summary Note:
Matilda Lotta Viitanen and the RM were introduced at a charity run in Helsinki. They ran side by side and discussed their philanthropic goals, which led to a meaningful collaboration.
With a career spanning nearly 31 years, Matilda Lotta Viitanen has established herself as a key player in the industry.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Matilda Lotta Viitanen is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1989, Matilda finished her secondary school education at Lahti Christian Institute.
Matilda graduated from Metropolia University of Applied Sciences in 1993, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
Matilda Lotta Viitanen is a 54 year old Reservoir Engineer from Finland. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
At St1 Oy, Matilda Lotta Viitanen held the position of Drilling Engineer from 1994 to 1999, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Reservoir Engineer at Fortum Corporation in 2001, further expanding her skill set.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 550000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She has flat located in Jarvenpää, worth 850000 EUR.


In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 1970000 EUR from her late grandfather, a renowned Neurosurgeon, in 2010.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Matilda as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
